column1: Ina was at the park, sitting on a bench. Ina wanted to watch the birds play. A small, pink bird was awake on a tree branch. Ina believed the bird was awake. As Ina was busy staring at a photo in her hand, the little bird quietly fell asleep. Ina looks up and sees the bird asleep.
column2: Does Ina think the bird is awake or asleep?
column3: Ina believes the bird is asleep.
column4: Ina believes the bird is awake.

column1: Jill was at the park, watching the kids play. She wanted to take a video of her son's first time on the swing. The camera was off. Jill believed the camera was off. As Jill was impatiently waiting for her son to gather courage and start swinging, a curious dog walked by and accidentally hit the camera with its tail, turning it on. Jill sees the dog walk away from the camera.
column2: Does Jill think the camera is off or on?
column3: Jill believes the camera is on.
column4: Jill believes the camera is off.

column1: Ben was at the ranch, looking after the animals. Ben wanted to ride his favorite horse. The saddle was not heavy. Ben believed the saddle was not heavy. As the day passed, the saddle got wet in the rain, making it heavy. Ben touches the saddle and feels it is heavy.
column2: Does Ben think the saddle is heavy or not?
column3: Ben believes the saddle is heavy.
column4: Ben believes the saddle is not heavy.

column1: Fred was at a fun fair, excited to play games. Fred wanted to win a big teddy bear as a prize. The game machine was on. Fred believed the game machine was on. column2: Does Fred think the game machine is on or off?
column3: Fred believes the game machine is off.
column4: Fred believes the game machine is on.

column1: Xander was in the park, playing with his friends. He wanted to build a big sand structure. The sand was wet and good for building. Xander thought the sand was wet and good for building. column3: Xander believes the sand is dry.
column4: Xander believes the sand is wet and good for building.

column3: Bella believes the book shelf is not full.
column4: Bella believes the book shelf is full.
